channel.title: A02 Algorithms on DeemoPoi's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in A02 Algorithms on DeemoPoi's Notes

item.title: 1.3 Bags, Queues, and Stacks
item.description: 0 terms 术语 Interface: description of data type, basic operations. Implementation: actual code implementing operations. (implementation can’t know details of client needs –> many clients can re-use the same implementation.) Client: program using operations defined in interface. (client can’t know details of implementaion –> client has many implementation from which to choose.) 1 stacks 栈 1.0 features 特征 A pushdown stack (or just a stack) is a collection that is based on the last-in-first-out (LIFO) policy.

item.title: 1.4 Analysis of Algorithms
item.description: 1 introduction 介绍 2 observations 观察 3 mathematical models 数学模型 4 order-of-growth classifications 分类 5 theory of algorithms 算法理论 6 memory 内存

item.title: 1.5 Union Find
item.description: 1 dynamic connectivity 动态连接 2 quick find 3 quick union 4 improvements 提高 5 applications 应用
